original_text: Traders from Damascus came to you because you had many valuable things to sell. They sold you wine from Helbon and white wool from Zahar. Traders from Damascus came to you because you had many valuable things to sell. They sold you wine from Helbon and white wool from Zahar.
korean_text: 너의 제품이 많고 각종 보화가 풍부하므로 다메섹이 너와 거래하였음이여 헬본 포도주와 흰 양털을 너와 거래하였도다

sentences.original_text: Traders from Damascus came to you
because you had many valuable things to sell
sentences.korean_translation: 당신에게는 판매할 귀한 물건들이 많았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: They sold you wine from Helbon
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 헬본에서 온 포도주를 당신에게 팔았습니다
그리고 자하르에서 온 흰 양모도 팔았습니다
